import React, { Component } from 'react' import { register } from './UserFunctions' class Register extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', password: '', errors: {} } this.onChange = this.onChange.bind(this) this.onSubmit = this.onSubmit.bind(this) } onChange(e) { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() const newUser = { first_name: this.state.first_name, last_name: this.state.last_name, email: this.state.email, password: this.state.password } register(newUser).then(res => { this.props.history.push(`/`) }) } render() { return (

Register

) } } export default Register
